pages.name: Potatoes
pages.text: A depiction of a fully grown potato crop.

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Potatoes are their own seeds. They also seem to only be found in villages far away from where my journey began.

pages.title: Crop
pages.text: Once harvested potato can be processed in many different ways. The following pages are all the products I have been able to produce from potatos.
